entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-12-23
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Permission for Notifications #12291
  • Unfocus fixed except for scroll containers #12290
  • iOS: content page is showing flyout menu icon when back button is set to false in flyout pages app #12289
  • Width/Text rendering on Android Button with ImageSource when ContentLayout set to Top #12288
  • Can't set the app name in MacCatalyst project for macOS #12287
  • failed to prepare device for development. xcode 14.2, iOS 16.2 - Physical device #12286
  • Setting `Slider.Maximum` or `Slider.Minimum` resets binding of `Slider.Value` #12285
    Backlog
  • Label control's height does not increase dynamically. #12284
  • WebView do not ask permissions for Video and Mic #12283
  • GraphicsView Interaction Event must continue when outside #12282
  • SensorSpeed intervals are different on every platform (and some are too large) #12281
  • [Android,Windows]When the parent's IsEnabled Property is set to false, the touch of the child is getting triggered. #12278
  • First .NET MAUI demo does not display on screen #12277

Closed

  • Building in Release mode for Android results in a "The selected execution mode is not supported for .NET projects." error #12226
  • Pasting into MAUI text entry does not work on iOS #10302
    Backlog
  • Notes tutorial on macOS is blank #12166
  • I cannot access the Command Line arguments in Windows - MAUI #12246
  • Visual Studio Installer does not offer .NET Multi-platform App UI development workload #12251
  • Border does not occupy all the space in a grid cell #9081
    Backlog

PullRequests

Updated

  • [Essentials] Geolocation foreground listening #9572
    area/essentials 🍞, community ✨
  • Update Essentials Preferences API Docs #12265
    area/docs 📓, t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [Android] Clear before each Image Source change #11787
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-image
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #12123
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
